examples.title: Get repository Issues
examples.description: Retrieve issues from a Gitee repository
examples.prompt: Use the list_repo_issues tool to get all issues from my repository

examples.title: Create Pull Request
examples.description: Implement code and create a Pull Request based on Issue details
examples.prompt: Create a pull request to fix issue #123 in my repository

examples.title: Comment & Close Issue
examples.description: Add a comment to an issue and close it
examples.prompt: Comment on issue #123 saying the fix is complete and close the issue

name: mcp-gitee
description: Gitee MCP Server is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server implementation for Gitee. It provides a set of tools for interacting with Gitee's API, allowing AI assistants to manage repositories, issues, pull requests, and more.
